extendedInfo.description: CareZone is a free app for busy moms and dads to safely organize personal family info and coordinate with a spouse, sibling, or sitter about the people that matter most to you -- your family.- Featured in the New York Times, USA Today, and on CNN- 4-star rating- Free to install and free to use!â ALWAYS HAVE IMPORTANT DATA Securely store info in your phone, such as a child or parentâs social security numbers, blood types, emergency contactsâeverything youâd otherwise squirrel away in a desk drawer.  Access it from the app or at CareZone.comâ SHARE ACCESS WITH OTHERS Share access to a family memberâs account with spouses, family members, helpers, and others you trust to keep everyone in sync.â KEEP A JOURNAL Share photos, record observations, or just keep immediate family up-to-date on how your child, spouse, or parent is doing.â MANAGE MEDICATIONS Keep a single list of medications, dosages, refill info, and ongoing history in your pocket. You and your family are never without a current list.We love feedback! You can reach us at support@carezone.com.- ChloeDirector of Team Happiness, and Dog

reviews.title: Add more please?
reviews.comment: Can it be added with another list than To-do? Shopping, assignment, and other list thay should be shared to whole family is a must. Otherwise, what a friendly userinterface. Love it! :)
reviews.author: Dewi Mais

reviews.title: Mass emails
reviews.comment: Overall the app is pretty good and the email notifications however I\'m not liking individual email notifications per member sent to my email. I have several members added (myself, my husband, my 3 children, etc) and each week I get an email per each member\'s activities. Perhaps since it\'s from the same app to my email, bundle it in one email so I\'m not reading a million emails per week?
reviews.author: Sierra Lewis

reviews.title: Delete someone?
reviews.comment: I put my wife twice in the list of Care people. How to erase it?
reviews.author: yoga hary dewanto

reviews.title: Needs calender
reviews.comment: This app is pretty much pointless to me without the calender once u add the calender ill give u a 5 star rating
reviews.author: Jeff Doucette

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Needs a calendar! Other than that very useful!
reviews.author: Kerry Hansen

reviews.title: Won\'t work since update
reviews.comment: Ever since the update....I cannot add journal entries, notes or edit my profile.  Please fix.
reviews.author: Michele Bulling

reviews.title: Still needs work
reviews.comment: I think adding space for the name and address of the school would be great. And the calendar is a must!
reviews.author: Rachel Redflower

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Good start but please add the To Do list and Notes as these are the two parts I use the most on a daily basis.
reviews.author: Jon Slattery

reviews.title: Great Work
reviews.comment: Glad to see the app was released, so far everything works great. Cant wait to see it at its full capacity. Great Job!!!
reviews.author: Julian De Angelis
